testcase.classname: Test login functionality of this site
testcase.name: TC01: Check login with successful credentials - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login homepage.............................................passed When user enters student and Password123 valid..............................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user is navigated to logout page.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Test login functionality of this site
testcase.name: TC02: Check login with invalid username - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login homepage.............................................passed When user enters invalid invalidStudent and valid Password123...............passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user should see invalid username popup.................................passed

testcase.classname: Test login functionality of this site
testcase.name: TC03: Check login with invalid password - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login homepage.............................................passed When user enters valid student and invalid invalidPass......................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user should see invalid password popup.................................passed

testcase.name: TC01: Validating getting in touch with hotel - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on website....................................................passed When user enters contact name John Doe......................................passed And user enters contact email johndoe@mail.com..............................passed And user enters contact phone 31232132111...................................passed And user enters contact subject Getting Access..............................passed And user enters contact message Something that is 20 characters long........passed And user clicks on contact submit...........................................passed Then user is prompted with thanks message...................................passed
